name: eDrawings 3D Part
summary: Learn about .EPRT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: EPRT files are part of the eDrawings file family, along with .EDRW (2D drawings) and .EASM (3D assemblies). These formats are designed to simplify the sharing and reviewing of CAD data, especially with stakeholders who don't have access to expensive CAD tools.

Users receiving EPRT files can use the free eDrawings Viewer (also known as "eDrawings") to view the 3D part, inspect its properties, present it, and print it. The utility is available for Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android.

instructions: You can open EPRT files in Dassault Systems eDrawings Viewer (Windows, Mac). The software is also available for Android and iOS. The desktop and mobile provide similar capabilities, allowing you to switch between drawing views and examine models in-depth.
Dassault Systemes SolidWorks also includes eDrawings Viewer in its installation package.
eDrawings Viewer can convert EPRT files to the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Autodesk AutoCAD with eDrawings Publisher plug-in
Autodesk Inventor with eDrawings Publisher plug-in
Trimble Sketchup with eDrawings Publisher plug-in
Dassault Systemes CATIA with eDrawings Publisher plug-in

images.alt: Screenshot of a .eprt file in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks eDrawings Viewer
images.caption: EPRT file open in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks eDrawings Viewer
